verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- The word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> 'e-Lai to לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. came again unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- Son אָדָ֡ם <WH120> 'a-Dam of man אֱמֹר֩ <WH559> 'e-Mor say לִנְגִ֨יד <WH5057> lin-Gid unto the prince צֹ֜ר <WH6865> tzor of Tyrus כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> koh- Thus אָמַ֣ר׀ <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהֹוִ֗ה <WH3069> Yah-weh GOD יַ֣עַן <WH3282> Ya-'an Because גָּבַ֤הּ <WH1361> ga-Vah [is] lifted up לִבְּךָ֙ <WH3820> lib-be-Cha Because thine heart וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> vat-To-mer and thou hast said אֵ֣ל <WH410> 'el I [am] a God אָ֔נִי <WH589> 'A-ni, in מוֹשַׁ֧ב <WH4186> mo-Shav [in] the seat אֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> E-lo-Him of God יָשַׁ֖בְתִּי <WH3427> ya-Shav-ti I sit בְּלֵ֣ב <WH3820> be-Lev in the midst יַמִּ֑ים <WH3220> yam-Mim; of the seas וְאַתָּ֤ה <WH859> ve-'at-Tah you אָדָם֙ <WH120> 'a-Dam yet thou [art] a man וְֽלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- and not אֵ֔ל <WH410> 'El, and not God וַתִּתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> vat-tit-Ten though thou set לִבְּךָ֖ <WH3820> lib-be-Cha thine heart כְּלֵ֥ב <WH3820> ke-Lev as the heart אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> E-lo-Him. of God

הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> hin-Neh Behold חָכָ֛ם <WH2450> cha-Cham Behold thou [art] wiser אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> 'at-Tah you; מִדָּנִאֵל mid-da-ni-'el כמִדָּֽנִיאֵ֑ל <WH1840> mid-da-ni-'El; Daniel קכָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all manner סָת֖וּם <WH5640> sa-Tum there is no secret לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo is a עֲמָמֽוּךָ׃ <WH6004> 'a-ma-Mu-cha. that they can hide

בְּחָכְמָֽתְךָ֙ <WH2451> be-cha-che-ma-te-Cha With thy wisdom וּבִתְבוּנָ֣תְךָ֔ <WH8394> u-vit-vu-Na-te-cha, and with thine understanding עָשִׂ֥יתָ <WH6213> 'a-Si-ta thou hast gotten לְּךָ֖ le-Cha חָ֑יִל <WH2428> Cha-yil; thee riches וַתַּ֛עַשׂ <WH6213> vat-Ta-'as and hast gotten זָהָ֥ב <WH2091> za-Hav gold וָכֶ֖סֶף <WH3701> va-Che-sef and silver בְּאוֹצְרוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH214> be-'otz-ro-Tei-cha. into thy treasures

בְּרֹ֧ב <WH7230> be-Ro By thy great חָכְמָתְךָ֛ <WH2451> cha-che-ma-te-Cha wisdom בִּרְכֻלָּתְךָ֖ <WH7404> bir-chul-la-te-Cha [and] by thy traffick הִרְבִּ֣יתָ <WH7235> hir-Bi-ta hast thou increased חֵילֶ֑ךָ <WH2428> chei-Le-cha; thy riches וַיִּגְבַּ֥הּ <WH1361> vai-yig-Bah is lifted up לְבָבְךָ֖ <WH3824> le-va-ve-Cha and thine heart בְּחֵילֶֽךָ׃ <WH2428> be-chei-Le-cha. because of thy riches ס sa-Mek

לָכֵ֕ן <WH3651> la-Chen Therefore כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> koh thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> Yah-weh; GOD יַ֛עַן <WH3282> Ya-'an Because תִּתְּךָ֥ <WH5414> tit-te-Cha Because thou hast set אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- לְבָבְךָ֖ <WH3824> le-va-ve-Cha as the heart כְּלֵ֥ב <WH3820> ke-Lev thine heart אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> E-lo-Him. of God

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> la-Chen, Therefore הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> hin-Ni behold מֵבִ֤יא <WH935> me-Vi Behold therefore I will bring עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-cha Against זָרִ֔ים <WH2114> za-Rim, strangers עָרִיצֵ֖י <WH6184> 'a-ri-Tzei upon thee the terrible גּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> go-Yim; of the nations וְהֵרִ֤יקוּ <WH7324> ve-he-Ri-ku and they shall draw חַרְבוֹתָם֙ <WH2719> char-vo-Tam their swords עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- Against יְפִ֣י <WH3308> ye-Fi against the beauty חָכְמָתֶ֔ךָ <WH2451> cha-che-ma-Te-cha, of thy wisdom וְחִלְּל֖וּ <WH2490> ve-chil-le-Lu and they shall defile יִפְעָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH3314> yif-'a-Te-cha. thy brightness

לַשַּׁ֖חַת <WH7845> lash-Sha-chat to the pit יֽוֹרִד֑וּךָ <WH3381> yo-ri-Du-cha; They shall bring thee down וָמַ֛תָּה <WH4463> va-Mat-tah the deaths מְמוֹתֵ֥י <WH4191> me-mo-Tei and thou shalt die חָלָ֖ל <WH2491> cha-Lal of [them that are] slain בְּלֵ֥ב <WH3820> be-Lev in the midst יַמִּֽים׃ <WH3220> yam-Mim. of the seas

הֶאָמֹ֤ר <WH559> he-'a-Mor Wilt thou yet תֹּאמַר֙ <WH559> to-Mar say אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> E-lo-Him god אָ֔נִי <WH589> 'A-ni, in לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> lif-Nei before הֹֽרְגֶ֑ךָ <WH2026> ho-re-Ge-cha; him that slayeth וְאַתָּ֥ה <WH859> ve-'at-Tah you אָדָ֛ם <WH120> 'a-Dam man וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- and not אֵ֖ל <WH410> 'el and no God בְּיַ֥ד <WH3027> be-Yad in the hand מְחַלְלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH2490> me-chal-Lei-cha. of him that slayeth

מוֹתֵ֧י <WH4194> mo-Tei the deaths עֲרֵלִ֛ים <WH6189> 'a-re-Lim of the uncircumcised תָּמ֖וּת <WH4191> ta-Mut Thou shalt die בְּיַד־ <WH3027> be-yad- by the hand זָרִ֑ים <WH2114> za-Rim; of strangers כִּ֚י <WH3588> ki for אֲנִ֣י <WH589> 'a-Ni I דִבַּ֔רְתִּי <WH1696> dib-Bar-ti, for I have spoken נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> ne-'Um [it] saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> Yah-weh. GOD ס sa-Mek
וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- Moreover the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> 'a-Dam of man שָׂ֥א <WH5375> sa take up קִינָ֖ה <WH7015> ki-Nah a lamentation עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech upon the king צ֑וֹר <WH6865> Tzor; of Tyrus וְאָמַ֣רְתָּ <WH559> ve-'a-Mar-ta and say לּ֗וֹ lo, כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> koh Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> 'a-Mar unto him Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> Yah-weh, GOD אַתָּה֙ <WH859> 'at-Tah You חוֹתֵ֣ם <WH2856> cho-Tem Thou sealest up תָּכְנִ֔ית <WH8508> ta-che-Nit, the sum מָלֵ֥א <WH4392> ma-Le full חָכְמָ֖ה <WH2451> choch-mah of wisdom וּכְלִ֥יל <WH3632> u-che-Lil and perfect יֹֽפִי׃ <WH3308> Yo-fi. in beauty

בְּעֵ֨דֶן <WH5731> be-'E-den Thou hast been in Eden גַּן־ <WH1588> gan- the garden אֱלֹהִ֜ים <WH430> E-lo-Him of God הָיִ֗יתָ <WH1961> ha-Yi-ta, become כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- Every אֶ֨בֶן <WH68> 'E-ven stone יְקָרָ֤ה <WH3368> ye-ka-Rah every precious מְסֻכָתֶ֙ךָ֙ <WH4540> me-su-cha-Te-cha [was] thy covering אֹ֣דֶם <WH124> 'O-dem the sardius פִּטְדָ֞ה <WH6357> pit-Dah topaz וְיָהֲלֹ֗ם <WH3095> ve-ya-ha-Lom, and the diamond תַּרְשִׁ֥ישׁ <WH8658> tar-Shish the beryl שֹׁ֙הַם֙ <WH7718> sho-ham the onyx וְיָ֣שְׁפֵ֔ה <WH3471> ve-Ya-she-Peh, and the jasper סַפִּ֣יר <WH5601> sap-Pir the sapphire נֹ֔פֶךְ <WH5306> No-fech, the emerald וּבָרְקַ֖ת <WH1304> u-va-re-Kat and the carbuncle וְזָהָ֑ב <WH2091> ve-za-Hav; and gold מְלֶ֨אכֶת <WH4399> me-Le-chet the workmanship תֻּפֶּ֤יךָ <WH8596> tup-Pei-cha of thy tabrets וּנְקָבֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5345> u-ne-ka-Vei-cha and of thy pipes בָּ֔ךְ <WH99999> Bach, בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> be-Yom in thee in the day הִבָּרַאֲךָ֖ <WH1254> hib-ba-ra-'a-Cha that thou wast created כּוֹנָֽנוּ׃ <WH3559> ko-Na-nu. was prepared

אַ֨תְּ־ <WH859> 'At- you כְּר֔וּב <WH3742> ke-Ruv, cherub מִמְשַׁ֖ח <WH4473> mi-Shach Thou [art] the anointed הַסּוֹכֵ֑ךְ <WH5526> has-so-Chech; that covereth וּנְתַתִּ֗יךָ <WH5414> u-ne-tat-Ti-cha, and I have set בְּהַ֨ר <WH2022> be-Har mountain קֹ֤דֶשׁ <WH6944> Ko-desh thee [so] thou wast upon the holy אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> E-lo-Him of God הָיִ֔יתָ <WH1961> ha-Yi-ta, become בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> be-Toch in the midst אַבְנֵי־ <WH68> 'av-nei- of the stones אֵ֖שׁ <WH784> 'esh of fire הִתְהַלָּֽכְתָּ׃ <WH1980> hit-hal-La-che-ta. thou hast walked up and down

תָּמִ֤ים <WH8549> ta-Mim Thou [wast] perfect אַתָּה֙ <WH859> 'at-Tah in בִּדְרָכֶ֔יךָ <WH1870> bid-ra-Chei-cha, in thy ways מִיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> mi-Yom from the day הִבָּֽרְאָ֑ךְ <WH1254> hib-ba-re-'Ach; that thou wast created עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- Until נִמְצָ֥א <WH4672> nim-Tza was found עַוְלָ֖תָה <WH5766> 'av-La-tah till iniquity בָּֽךְ׃ Bach.

בְּרֹ֣ב <WH7230> be-Ro By the multitude רְכֻלָּתְךָ֗ <WH7404> re-chul-la-te-Cha, of thy merchandise מָל֧וּ <WH4390> ma-Lu they have filled תוֹכְךָ֛ <WH8432> toch-Cha the midst חָמָ֖ס <WH2555> cha-Mas of thee with violence וַֽתֶּחֱטָ֑א <WH2398> vat-te-che-Ta; and thou hast sinned וָאֶחַלֶּלְךָ֩ <WH2490> va-'e-chal-lel-Cha therefore I will cast thee as profane מֵהַ֨ר <WH2022> me-Har out of the mountain אֱלֹהִ֤ים <WH430> E-lo-Him of God וָֽאַבֶּדְךָ֙ <WH6> va-'ab-bed-Cha and I will destroy כְּר֣וּב <WH3742> ke-Ruv cherub הַסֹּכֵ֔ךְ <WH5526> has-so-Chech, thee O covering מִתּ֖וֹךְ <WH8432> mit-Toch from the midst אַבְנֵי־ <WH68> 'av-nei- of the stones אֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> 'Esh. of fire

גָּבַ֤הּ <WH1361> ga-Vah was lifted up לִבְּךָ֙ <WH3820> lib-be-Cha Thine heart בְּיָפְיֶ֔ךָ <WH3308> be-ya-fe-Ye-cha, because of thy beauty שִׁחַ֥תָּ <WH7843> shi-Cha-ta thou hast corrupted חָכְמָתְךָ֖ <WH2451> cha-che-ma-te-Cha thy wisdom עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- by reason of יִפְעָתֶ֑ךָ <WH3314> yif-'a-Te-cha; thy brightness עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- reason אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz thee to the ground הִשְׁלַכְתִּ֗יךָ <WH7993> hish-lach-Ti-cha, I will cast לִפְנֵ֧י <WH6440> lif-Nei thee before מְלָכִ֛ים <WH4428> me-la-Chim kings נְתַתִּ֖יךָ <WH5414> ne-tat-Ti-cha I will lay לְרַ֥אֲוָה <WH7200> le-Ra-'a-vah that they may behold בָֽךְ׃ <WH99999> Vach.

מֵרֹ֣ב <WH7230> me-Ro by the multitude עֲוֹנֶ֗יךָ <WH5771> 'a-vo-Nei-cha, of thine iniquities בְּעֶ֙וֶל֙ <WH5766> be-'E-vel by the iniquity רְכֻלָּ֣תְךָ֔ <WH7404> re-chul-La-te-cha, of thy traffick חִלַּ֖לְתָּ <WH2490> chil-Lal-ta Thou hast defiled מִקְדָּשֶׁ֑יךָ <WH4720> mik-da-Shei-cha; thy sanctuaries וָֽאוֹצִא־ <WH3318> va-'o-tzi- therefore will I bring forth אֵ֤שׁ <WH784> 'esh a fire מִתּֽוֹכְךָ֙ <WH8432> mit-toch-Cha from the midst הִ֣יא <WH1931> hi It אֲכָלַ֔תְךָ <WH398> 'a-cha-Lat-cha, of thee it shall devour וָאֶתֶּנְךָ֤ <WH5414> va-'et-ten-Cha thee and I will bring לְאֵ֙פֶר֙ <WH665> le-'E-fer thee to ashes עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, upon the earth לְעֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> le-'ei-Nei in the sight כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- of all רֹאֶֽיךָ׃ <WH7200> ro-'Ei-cha. of all them that behold

כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- All יוֹדְעֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH3045> yod-'Ei-cha All they that know בָּֽעַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> ba-'am-Mim, thee among the people שָׁמְמ֖וּ <WH8074> sha-me-Mu shall be astonished עָלֶ֑יךָ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-cha; and בַּלָּה֣וֹת <WH1091> bal-la-Hot at thee thou shalt be a terror הָיִ֔יתָ <WH1961> ha-Yi-ta, have become וְאֵינְךָ֖ <WH369> ve-'ei-ne-Cha and never עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- against עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> o-Lam. alway פ Peh
וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- Again the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> 'a-Dam of man שִׂ֥ים <WH7760> sim set פָּנֶ֖יךָ <WH6440> pa-Nei-cha thy face אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- toward צִיד֑וֹן <WH6721> tzi-Don; against Zidon וְהִנָּבֵ֖א <WH5012> ve-hin-na-Ve and prophesy עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-ha. against

וְאָמַרְתָּ֗ <WH559> ve-'a-mar-Ta, And say כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> koh Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> Yah-weh, GOD הִנְנִ֤י <WH2005> hin-Ni behold עָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH5921> 'a-La-yich I am against צִיד֔וֹן <WH6721> tzi-Don, Behold I [am] against thee O Zidon וְנִכְבַּדְתִּ֖י <WH3513> ve-nich-bad-Ti and I will be glorified בְּתוֹכֵ֑ךְ <WH8432> be-to-Chech; in the midst וְֽיָדְע֞וּ <WH3045> ve-ya-de-'U of thee and they shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for אֲנִ֣י <WH589> 'a-Ni I יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh that I [am] the LORD בַּעֲשׂ֥וֹתִי <WH6213> ba-'a-So-ti when I shall have executed בָ֛הּ <WH99999> vah שְׁפָטִ֖ים <WH8201> she-fa-Tim judgments וְנִקְדַּ֥שְׁתִּי <WH6942> ve-nik-Dash-ti in her and shall be sanctified בָֽהּ׃ <WH99999> Vah.

וְשִׁלַּחְתִּי־ <WH7971> ve-shil-lach-ti- For I will send בָ֞הּ vah דֶּ֤בֶר <WH1698> De-ver into her pestilence וָדָם֙ <WH1818> va-Dam and blood בְּח֣וּצוֹתֶ֔יהָ <WH2351> be-Chu-tzo-Tei-ha, into her streets וְנִפְלַ֤ל <WH5307> ve-nif-Lal shall be judged חָלָל֙ <WH2491> cha-Lal and the wounded בְּתוֹכָ֔הּ <WH8432> be-to-Chah, in the midst בְּחֶ֥רֶב <WH2719> be-Che-rev of her by the sword עָלֶ֖יהָ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-ha upon מִסָּבִ֑יב <WH5439> mis-sa-Viv; upon her on every side וְיָדְע֖וּ <WH3045> ve-ya-de-'U and they shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. that I [am] the LORD
